title: Unnamed villa
description: A Roman-era villa located in near modern Pardigon, commune Croix-Valmere (BAtlas 16 C3 Pardigon (eastern of two))

properties.description: There are two Roman villa near Pardigon. Remains of the villa in the commune La Croix-Valmere is visible on satellite images
properties.title: Center point of remains of Roman villa near Pardigon, commune La Croix-Valmere
